advantages.text-1: Kanban board is pleasant to use: tasks' color can be customized according to every user preferences
advantages.text-2: Kanban board is convenient to use: two languages are supported
advantages.text-3: Kanban board is easy to use: columns and tasks are movable and can be dragged to the best suitable place

team.description-1: Board page, global-search pages and logic development, additional functionality implementation, application design, video demonstration, code-review
team.description-2: Teamwork organization, welcome page, auth page and logic development, localization, backend error handling implementation, code-review
team.description-3: The main page for showing boards, header, and footer development, code-review
